betterquesting:10.desc:8:
While §6Heat Generator§rs are cool and all, it's much better to have an §erenewable energy supply§r to §econstantly feed your machines§r. That is where the generators like the §6Advanced Solar Generator§r comes in. It's similar to a §6Daylight Sensor§r, only it §etakes in sunlight and converts it into an energy source§r.

To craft one, you will need two §6Enriched Alloy§rs, three §6Iron Ingot§rs, and four §6Solar Generator§rs.

The only downside to this generator is that it will only work in the daytime (§7At least in the overworld, §o*wink* *wink*§r).
